title: AlikaMerrow
author: AlikaMerrow
content: I know that few people have heard of bosagora before or have not even heard of it at all. Bosagora is a foundation with its own blockchain and their network will launch next month. The company entered the market more than 4 years ago and has strong partnerships and Don Tapscott is their key advisor. Bosagora is committed to moving the real financial market to blockchain. Wouldn't you like to buy real estate from the comfort of your own home? One of Bosagora's partnerships will help you do just that. Buy NFT real estate and you own it. Don't you want to waste time driving to the university? Bosagora solves this issue with their Meta University. In addition, they will use their BOA coin as a means of payment and apply it to their partner The 9 Company, that is a kiosk enterprise (payment terminals). BizForum was held the other day, where CEO Kim In-Hwan met with the mayor of Seoul and talked about the development of blockchain in the real world. In addition, BOSagora continues to communicate with local governments, companies, and organizations about the future of the blockchain industry these days. Therefore, a "real-life blockchain platform," connecting everyday life and blockchain, will be an important element for "creating a better world through blockchain technology."

comments.author: AzamNurWahid
comments.body: Frankly, I've never heard of a bosagora. Judging from what the bosagora is, it looks like this is a project that manages real estate, or it might also make it easier for people to get housing easily. It seems that this project is quite interesting and hopefully it will be useful for the wider community

comments.author: AlikaMerrow
comments.body: Not just real estate. Bosagora also creates Meta-sity, Meta university and Eco-museum. It has partnerships with cloud storage services and payment terminals.

comments.author: Antonas1
comments.body: It's an ICO from South Korea right? I didn't see something different with other coins or token projects there. "we will strive to move closer to BOSAGORA’s vision of ‘Making a Better World”, they said, but most people who engage with the ICO projects will say that thing.Too much projects has started with the same thing, Bob's Repair is one of them. And don't forget about education project from Tether with their Blockchain and Cryptocurrency school in Swiss (Lugano).

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: AlikaMerrow on October 19, 2022, 10:22:44 AM...Bosagora is a foundation with its own blockchain and their network will launch next month. The company entered the market more than 4 years ago and has strong partnership ...It will take a few more years and Bosagora will create its own website)) Where did you find such information? Perhaps it would be easier for you to post links to the presentation of this project here, in which case everyone would be able to independently conduct a Bosagora study.

comments.author: NicNacCoin
comments.body: Quote from: AlikaMerrow on October 19, 2022, 10:42:21 AMNot just real estate. Bosagora also creates Meta-sity, Meta university and Eco-museum. It has partnerships with cloud storage services and payment terminals.  I have no concept or idea about Bosagora. I had never heard of it before and didn't know about it.But you have got a rough idea from here and got to know about Bosagora today.If he could explain it a little better, then everyone would understand better.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: AlikaMerrow on October 19, 2022, 10:22:44 AMI know that few people have heard of bosagora before or have not even heard of it at all. Bosagora is a foundation with its own blockchain and their network will launch next month. The company entered the market more than 4 years ago and has strong partnerships and Don Tapscott is their key advisor. Four years and yet they are still unknown in the community although they are already in the market https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/bosagora they should do proper marketing because even if the project is promising and can offer something in the industry, even without proper marketing they will still remain unknown.They have an official thread here, but the thread maker only has to post and those posts were already two years ago, they could do better than this, if they want to gain more investors and supporters.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5266527.0

comments.author: Ayers
comments.body: Quote from: AlikaMerrow on October 19, 2022, 12:59:24 PMhttps://bosagora.iohttps://finance.yahoo.com/bosagora-launches-biznet-build-business-090000643.htmlhttps://www.miricanvas.com/v/1183anahttps://t.me/bosagora_engi have never heard of this project, this is my first time seeing it, the brief examination of the project seems very well organized and well prepared. if you are really interested, you should learn carefully and follow closely to capture the information. i also just checked its price, the highest ATH was $0.50 and now BOA is trading at 0.04, meaning more than 10 times down from the peak, this is a good entry price to hold. you know the project better than we do, i think the decision is up to you, we can't give you better advice

comments.author: Nurullah72
comments.created_time: October 19, 2022, 02:04:12 PMLast edit: October 19, 2022, 05:05:24 PM by Nurullah72
comments.body: Yes I heard, it is a quality project and the team is doing very well, I recommend you to examine the partners with high quality. I will continue to add Boa to my bag. Boa is currently listed on major exchanges like kucoin, gateio and bithumb

comments.author: Antonas1
comments.created_time: October 19, 2022, 03:22:54 PMLast edit: October 19, 2022, 03:36:19 PM by Antonas1
comments.body: Quote from: Doell on October 19, 2022, 02:32:32 PMMaybe they're not doing the right marketing, so a lot of people don't know about it, but I know this. Even last year's bull run they also increase up to $0.5, this project is indeed promising. I also actually want to have some of them because has been monitoring this in the market for a long time, maybe later if the price drops below $0.03 because I want to buy it with a very cheap price. So you have a result of your research, is it graphic analytic or fundamentals? And what are the good things that make you really want to buy a BOA? Because I didn't see anything unique about Bosagora, it appears to be similar to other crypto projects.

comments.author: AlikaMerrow
comments.body: Bosagora has partnered with Pinplus Global. They are in the real estate business and will be providing real estate purchases through NFT. I was very interested in that.

comments.author: comebuy2
comments.body: I have been holding it for a long time, just want to compliment the dev team. they have worked so hard the last few weeks. The commits are crazy. https://github.com/bosagora/I'm so excited because it is my first time to see people discussing about $BOA.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: No thank you.Seem like just a company who want to profited him self and the idea it's just like a word & word marketing. Beside that, NFTs trend is over and already reached the peek you can see the google trend.The idea and concept university is not gonna work i guess from my perspective.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Nurullah72 on October 19, 2022, 02:04:12 PMYes I heard, it is a quality project and the team is doing very well, I recommend you to examine the partners with high quality. I will continue to add Boa to my bag. Boa is currently listed on major exchanges like kucoin, gateio and bithumbYour registration, as well as the registration of the OP on the forum has the sole purpose of shill Bosagora. Therefore, your advice has nothing to do with a useful recommendation. For those who have decided to invest in this coin, it is necessary to pay attention that, despite the fact that the coin has a listing on KuCoin, its trading volume is very low, which indicates that it is unclaimed.

comments.author: AlikaMerrow
comments.body: I have been following and investing in this project for a long time. As an investor, I would like more people to learn about the project. That is why I created an account on the forum.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: Antonas1 on October 19, 2022, 11:36:53 AMI"we will strive to move closer to BOSAGORA’s vision of ‘Making a Better World”, they said, but most people who engage with the ICO projects will say that thing.hahhaha yep almost all new project had the same vision that making a better world or bitcoin killer so people willing to buy the fact not like that.Dyor and stay away if doesn't feel right

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: vanesha on October 19, 2022, 03:41:08 PMthis is the first time i heard the name bosagara. but looking at the bosagara concept involving NFT in the real estate concept it seems that it will lead to a more serious development of NFT because we have never seen the use of NFT in real estate so bosagara may be the first to try it.This is not the first time that NFTs have been tied to real estate, in fact it was tried very early on when the market of NFTs was very popular and as you may guess it did not worked.To me it says a lot that a project that has been around for so long has failed to capture the imagination of the community, after all if there is something we are lacking in this market are quality projects, and as soon as any project seems like it is going somewhere vasts amounts of money are invested them, so I suggest people to be careful when investing in a coin like this one.
